publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-03 11:44:04 -0400.

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of approximately two dozen letters from Jerry Weinberg to Ben Lederman (most from the Spanish Civil War, the remainder from WWII), and two letters from Lederman to Weinberg.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Tamiment Library & Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives for more information and to schedule an appointment, tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu or 212-998-2630.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Tamiment Library & Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives has no information about copyright ownership for this collection and is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from it. Copyright held by the original collection creator is expected to pass into the public domain 70 years after the creator's death. For more information, please contact the Tamiment Library & Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, tamiment.wagner@nyu.edu or 212-998-2630.
